text: :For the grass moth genus, see Pyrausta (moth). Pyrausta (also called pyrallis, pyragones) is a mythological insect-sized dragon from Cyprus. It resembles a four-legged insect with filmy wings and a dragon's head. It lived in the fire like a salamander and died if it went away from the fire. ==See also== *Salamander (legendary creature) *Dragons in Greek mythology ==References== *Shuker, Karl. (1995).
